Module Assegnamento1
Package com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1

Class Activity

java.lang.Object
com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.Activity
public class Activity
extends java.lang.Object
The Activity class defines the behavior of an activity.

It specifies name, type and member list and involves methods to manage them

  • Constructor Details

    • Activity

      public Activity​(java.lang.String name, com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.ActivityType type)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the activity.
      type - type of the activity. It can be either a course or a competition.

  • Method Details

      the activity's name.

      Setter for the name of the activity.

      public java.util.List<Member> getMemberList()

      Returns:
      type of activity.

    • setType

      public void setType​(com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.ActivityType type)
      Setter for the activity type.
      Parameters:
      type - type of the activity

    • enroll

      public void enroll​(Member m)
      Allows a member to join the activity. This member will be added to the memberList.
      Parameters:
      m - the member who wants to enroll to the activity.

    • printMemberList

      public void printMemberList()
      Prints the list of members enrolled in an activity.

    • remove

      public void remove​(Member m)
      Allows a member to unsubscribe from the activity.

      This method removes the member from the memberList.

      Parameters:
      m - the member who wants to leave the activity.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a textual representation of the activity.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the activity's name and its type (course or competition)

    • fullInfo

      public java.lang.String fullInfo()
      Returns a full textual representation of the activity including members.
      Returns:
      the activity's name, its type (course or competition) and the enrolled members.
